title: How to Recall an Email in Gmail

steps.title: Open Gmail.
steps.content: Open Gmail. Go to https://www.gmail.com in your computer's web browser. This will open your Gmail inbox if you're logged in. If you aren't logged into Gmail, enter your email address and password when prompted.

steps.title: Enable the "Undo Send" feature if necessary.
steps.content: Enable the "Undo Send" feature if necessary. If you aren't using the new version of Gmail, you'll need to turn on "Undo Send" by doing the following: [1] X Research source Click . Click Settings in the drop-down menu. Check the "Enable Undo Send" box on the General tab. Select an amount of time during which you can undo an email from the "Send cancellation period" drop-down menu. Scroll down and click Save Changes .

steps.title: Click ＋ Compose.
steps.content: Click ＋ Compose . It's in the upper-left side of the Gmail inbox. [2] X Research source On the classic version of Gmail, you'll click COMPOSE .

steps.title: Enter a recipient and subject.
steps.content: Enter a recipient and subject. Type your recipient's email address into the "To" text box, then press Tab ↹ and type in whatever you want your email's subject line to read. [3] X Research source

steps.title: Type in your email's message.
steps.content: Type in your email's message. In the main text box, enter whatever message you want to use for your email . [4] X Research source

steps.title: Click Send.
steps.content: Click Send . It's a blue button at the bottom of the window. Doing so will send your email. [5] X Research source

steps.title: Click Undo when prompted.
steps.content: Click Undo when prompted. This message will appear in the lower-left side of the page (new Gmail) or at the top of the page (classic Gmail). [6] X Research source By default, you'll have 5 seconds (new Gmail) or 10 seconds (classic Gmail) to recall your message.

steps.title: Review your unsent email.
steps.content: Review your unsent email. Once your email is recalled, it will reopen as a draft. You can edit or discard it from there.

steps.title: Change the amount of time you have before you can no longer recall an email.
steps.content: Change the amount of time you have before you can no longer recall an email. If you're using the new version of Gmail and you want more than 5 seconds to recall an email, do the following: [7] X Research source Click . Click Settings . Click the "Send cancellation period" drop-down menu on the General tab. Select a time in seconds (e.g., 30 ) from the resulting drop-down menu. Scroll down and click Save Changes .

steps.title: Open Gmail.
steps.content: Open Gmail. Tap the Gmail app, which resembles a red "M" on a white background. This will open your Gmail inbox if you're logged in. If you aren't logged in, you'll need to enter your email address and password when prompted. Unfortunately, you cannot recall an email sent from Gmail on Android .

steps.title: Tap Compose .
steps.content: Tap Compose . It's the pencil icon in the bottom-right corner of the screen. A new email form will appear. [8] X Research source

steps.title: Enter your recipient's email address.
steps.content: Enter your recipient's email address. In the "To" text box, type in the email address of the person to whom you want to send an email. [9] X Research source

steps.title: Add a subject and body text.
steps.content: Add a subject and body text. Type your email's subject into the "Subject" text box, then type whatever you want in the email's body. [10] X Research source

steps.title: Tap the "Send" icon.
steps.content: Tap the "Send" icon. It's in the upper-right corner of the screen. Doing so will send your email. [11] X Research source

steps.title: Tap UNDO when prompted.
steps.content: Tap UNDO when prompted. This option will appear in the lower-right corner of the screen. [12] X Research source You'll have five seconds to recall the email.

steps.title: Review your unsent email.
steps.content: Review your unsent email. Once your email is recalled, it will reopen as a draft. You can edit or discard it from there.

steps.title: Open Gmail.
steps.content: Open Gmail. Tap the Gmail app, which resembles a red "M" on a white background. This will open your Gmail inbox if you're logged in. If you aren't logged in, you'll need to enter your email address and password when prompted.

steps.title: Tap ☰.
steps.content: Tap ☰ . It's in the top-left corner of the screen. Doing so prompts a pop-out menu. [13] X Research source

steps.title: Scroll down and tap Settings.
steps.content: Scroll down and tap Settings . This option is at the bottom of the pop-out menu. The Settings menu will open.

steps.title: Tap General settings.
steps.content: Tap General settings . You'll find this on the Settings page. [14] X Research source

steps.title: Scroll down and tap Confirm before sending.
steps.content: Scroll down and tap Confirm before sending . It's at the bottom of the page. This will ensure that any email you send will have to be confirmed before it leaves your inbox from now on, thus preventing you from accidentally sending an email. If you see a checkmark to the right of this option, it's already enabled.

steps.title: Important
steps.content: Important Only Google Workspace administrators can install this add-on. The ability to recall emails is only available for emails sent within your organization on the Google Workspace domain. This feature is not available for personal Gmail accounts.

steps.title: Open Gmail.
steps.content: Open Gmail. Go to https://www.gmail.com in your computer's web browser. This will open your Gmail inbox if you're logged in. If you aren't logged into Gmail, enter your email address and password when prompted.

steps.title: Click +.
steps.content: Click +. It's in the right side of the Gmail inbox.

steps.title: Search for add-on on Google Workspace Marketplace:
steps.content: Search for add-on on Google Workspace Marketplace: To see and install this add-on, you must have administrator privileges within your Google Workspace. Search "remail". Click on ReMail add-on in the list.

steps.title: Install Google Workspace Marketplace add-on:
steps.content: Install Google Workspace Marketplace add-on: Click on "Admin install".

steps.title: Open your "Sent" email section.
steps.content: Open your "Sent" email section.

steps.title: Find the email you want to recall.
steps.content: Find the email you want to recall.

steps.title: Open the ReMail add-on and click on RECALL EMAIL button.
steps.content: Open the ReMail add-on and click on RECALL EMAIL button.

steps.title: Confirm that you want to recall email
steps.content: Confirm that you want to recall email

steps.title: Email recall confirmation.
steps.content: Email recall confirmation.
